pr.title: Why hire me?
pr.author: 0ce10tsgit
pr.subtitle: wants you to merge his skills into your team

paragraphs: My name is Oyon (Oy-in) and I am an undergrad currently pursuing a B.S in Information Technology and Web Sciences at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute. This is my PR to get you to hopefully hire me.

To begin with this site is one of  many applications ive developed , deployed and maintained myself.  I learned cloud deployment both through this site with Digital ocean and through my ITWS1100 class with Azure cloud deployment for a term project

I have experience with PostgreSQL and MariaDB, both designing schemas as writing statements for backend systems for multiple projects .over a range complexity  In other Data skills I took a Biology Computational Lab where I used R on Datasets to prove/disprove a hypothesis
